title: TUESDAY TEAMFIGHT! Come play vs the Boards Dev Team!
body:
rawr! come play!

GAME NAME: TUESDAY TEAMFIGHT
PASSWORD: fluffy

<3 {{champion:111}}

edit: thanks for playing, see you next week <3

replies.body: How do you get to these games? I can never find them when I do a search.

Play -> Custom -> Normal -> Join Game, make sure the 'show private game' button at the bottom is checked. And you have to be there while the lobby is filling up; Tuesday Teamfights are usually around 2 PM PST. or PDT. Whatever.
Thanks for the info. I may just not be waiting long enough then.
Nunu's looks cool.
You're right, this is not the appropriate place.
I would still like some clarification as to who thought them up and why? Seems as though there's no board post on them yet.
You might want to go ask in an appropriate subforum/thread, for example http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts
It's not as though a Rioter would actually reply to me in one of their Forbidden Zones as it seems, so I thought why not here.
What are these downvotes after an OP comment has been moderator-deleted? o.x
I didn't quite see a reason for my comment to be deleted as this isn't really a big thread and I don't think I did anything wrong. Apparently a few other people thought so too.
it had nothing to do with this thread.

Lol what does that have to do with anything..
Posting a thread about something in the wrong section is _something_
But let the man ask his question, you dont need to answer...
hey dude you know anything about getting a report button in champ select?
Thanks for the game. Legit first time Fiora. Just gonna tell everyone I got that penta.

You can say that, but deep down, you will know the truth.

The truth that you were one auto away.
One of the weirdest games I've ever seen. 0.o
Thanks for the game. It was...outrageous.
^_^ NO YOU!
I tried, but it's full.
cant find it

To tilted to play, rank experience bad af. 

Gl tho!
